text: Md. Abdul Halim is a Bangladesh Awami League politician and the former Member of Parliament of Mymensingh-8. ==Career== Halim was elected to parliament from Mymensingh-8 as a Bangladesh Awami League candidate in 1973. ==References== Category:Awami League politicians Category:Living people Category:1st Jatiya Sangsad members Category:1970 births
title: Md. Abdul Halim
